revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Snowpoint Temple |image = [[File:Snowpoint Temple.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Snowpoint Temple. |tokens = 96,500 |location = East of Snowpoint City. }} '''Snowpoint Temple''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 2,603,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat || rowspan=3 colspan=2 | <center>N/A |- | [[File:Sneasel.png|40px]] Sneasel |- | [[File:Smoochum.png|40px]] Smoochum |}
===Boss Encounters=== <!--T:5-->
<!--T:6--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Jynx.png|40px]] Jynx || <center>10,000,000 || rowspan=2 colspan=2 | <center> N/A |- | [[File:Regigigas.png|40px]] Regigigas || <center>11,000,000 |}
==Items== <!--T:7-->
<tabs> <!--T:8--> <tab name="No Debuff">
<!--T:9--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears !! Requirement |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || 2 || 49.98% || 48.00% || 40.00% || rowspan=2| <center> N/A |- | {{Bag2|Aspear}} || N/A || 24.99% || 24.00% || 20.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 10.00% || 10.50% || 12.47% || rowspan=2| <center> N/A |- | {{Bag2|White Shard}} || N/A || 10.00% || 10.50% || 12.47% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Icicle Plate}} || N/A || 4.01% || 5.20% || 10.00% || <center> N/A |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Large Restore}} || N/A || 0.50% || 0.80% || 1.99% || rowspan=2| <center> N/A |- | {{Bag2|Never Melt Ice}} || N/A || 0.50% || 0.80% || 1.99% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Protein}} || N/A || 0% || 0% || 1.06% || 350 Clears |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:10-->
<!--T:11--> After Reaching Alola, the drop chance for items in Sinnoh will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
<!--T:12--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears !! Requirement |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || 2 || 50.00% || 50.00% || 50.00% || rowspan=2| <center> N/A |- | {{Bag2|Aspear}} || N/A || 25.00% || 25.00% || 25.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% || rowspan=2| <center> N/A |- | {{Bag2|White Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Icicle Plate}} || N/A || 0.90% || 0.90% || 0.90% || <center> N/A |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Large Restore}} || N/A || 0.05% || 0.05% || 0.05% || rowspan=2| <center> N/A |- | {{Bag2|Never Melt Ice}} || N/A || 0.05% || 0.05% || 0.05% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Protein}} || N/A || 0% || 0% || <0.01% || 350 Clears |} </tab> </tabs>
